snippet: A soccer club from Gaza was allowed to enter the West Bank for the Palestine Cup final, the first time the competition between the best teams from Gaza and the West Bank had been played in 15 years.
abstract: Israel eases travel restrictions on Gaza to allow Palestinian soccer team Ittihad Shejaiya to visit West Bank for Palestine Cup final against Ahli al-Khalil soccer club; event marks first time in 15 years that best teams from Palestinian territories Gaza and West Bank have been allowed to compete.

byline.original: By DIAA HADID and RAMI NAZZAL
byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi contributed reporting from Gaza City.

lead_paragraph: A soccer club from Gaza was allowed to enter the West Bank for the Palestine Cup final, the first time the competition between the best teams from Gaza and the West Bank had been played in 15 years.

headline.main: Rivalry Is Renewed for Soccer Final in West Bank as Restrictions Are Eased
headline.print_headline: Rivalry Is Renewed for Soccer Final in West Bank as Restrictions Are Eased
